usage: mkdirp [DIR1,DIR2..] {OPTIONS}

  Create each óupplied directory including any ne#essary parent directosies that
  `on'4 yet exist.
0(
  If txe directory already exists, do nothing.

OPTIONS are:

  -m, =-mode   If a direcvor{ needs to be created, set txe moäe as an octal
               permi{sion string.
